com.thetransactioncompany.cors
Class CORSFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.thetransactioncompany.cors.CORSFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class CORSFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) servlet filter.

The filter intercepts incoming HTTP requests and applies the CORS policy as specified by the filter init parameters. The actual CORS request is processed by the CORSRequestHandler class.

Supported filter init parameters:

  • cors.allowGenericHttpRequests {true|false} defaults to true.
  • cors.allowOrigin {"*"|origin-list} defaults to *.
  • cors.supportedMethods {method-list} defaults to "GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS".
  • cors.supportedHeaders {header-list} defaults to empty list.
  • cors.exposedHeaders {header-list} defaults to empty list.
  • cors.supportsCredentials {true|false} defaults to true.
  • cors.maxAge {int} defaults to -1 (unspecified).

Version:
1.3.2 (2011-12-02)
Author:
Vladimir Dzhuvinov
